```{r setup}
devtools::install_github("Elaineflying/BonusLab", build_vignettes = TRUE)
library(ridgereg)
```

### import sample dataset iris
```{r}
data(iris)
```

### create a ridgereg mode object using ridgereg@new function
```{r}
ridgereg_mod_object <- ridgereg$new(Petal.Length~Species, data = iris)
```

### print the coefficients and coefficient names according to multiple regression model
```{r}
ridgereg_mod_object$print()
```

### print the coefficients
```{r}
ridgereg_mod_object$coef()
```
